snippet: The decline was accompanied by another steep drop in gasoline prices.
abstract: American benchmark price for crude oil falls below symbolically significant $60 a barrel level for first time in over five years; price has fallen over 40 percent since early June 2014.
lead_paragraph: The decline was accompanied by another steep drop in gasoline prices.

headline.main: Oil Breaks $60 Threshold for First Time in 5 Years
headline.print_headline: Oil Breaks $60 Threshold for First Time in 5 Years
